text: The 2021 Tocantinense aviation disaster took place on January 24, 2021, when a plane crashed shortly after departing Palmasâ€“Brigadeiro Lysias Rodrigues Airport in Brazil. Six people were on board, killing four people. Those killed were members of the Palmas Futebol e Regatas association football team members, the club's owner and the plane's pilot. The plane was en route to a regional cup football game between Palmas and Vila Nova, for the Brazilian Copa Verde championship. ==Deaths== The victims of the crash were identified as: * Marcus Molinari * Guilherme Noe * Lucas Praxedes * Ranule * Lucas Meira * Commander Wagner ==References== Category:2021 in Brazil Category:Aviation accidents and incidents in 2021 Category:2020s disasters in South America Category:January 2021 events Category:Aviation accidents and incidents in South America
title: 2021 Palmas FR plane crash
